name: Saratoga Inn & Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We wanted to get away for an overnight stay somewhere close so selected this hotel. The rooms are large and include nice artwork on the walls, a small couch and fridge and microwave. Continental breakfast seemed fresh and included make your own waffles, fruit, pastries, muffins, yogurt, bagels, juice, coffee, cereal & milk (no eggs). That's where the good review ends. Nothing special about the service, hotel is older, pool and hot tub were closed for repair. The toiletries include a combination shampoo/conditioner in a packet that was hard to open instead of having it in the typical bottle. One of our two entry cards didn't work day one, and day two, when we came back, neither worked. There aren't many options in this area and the hotel is okay. You just won't be wowed by your experience here.
reviews.title: Clean, Large Rooms, But Nothing Special

reviews.text: This Best Western was like any other you would go to. I stayed here because it was on the way to my final destination.
reviews.title: Just a place to stay for the night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lobby was nice and clean. The room was pretty big.
reviews.title: Inexpensive, but fine.
Beware of double charging, and " hidden" charges.
reviews.text: There was a pole to keep the window shut because there were no locks on the window on the first floor. And the coffee maker was pretty gross.
Not luxurious but it was cheap.
reviews.title: clean and functional

reviews.text: This hotel was much quieter than I expected being close to a major highway.
reviews.title: Very Comfortable, would recommend

reviews.text: The only con about my stay was when I walked up to the breakfast bar in stocking feet and the floor was sticky and my socks kept sticking to the floor. I went back to my room to put shoes on.
reviews.title: Simply okay. No frills or thrills.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast, as usual for a best western, was excellent. Especially the waffles and the pre-measured cups of waffle mix all ready to go into the waffle maker.
reviews.title: Nice clean jacuzzi room
Need sleep? Don't stay here!
reviews.text: My business partner and I stayed here one night and it was okay. It has Wifi, cable and a simple breakfast. Not very impressive but it worked. If you can find something a little newer and nicer I would suggest doing so. But if you need a place to stay and you dont have many options this will work.

aka: Best Western Saratoga Hotel Cannon Falls
